timeline.content:
Hi Kufu Fujikawa, üòä

I hope you're doing well! üåü

I'm Aashutush from the UCL Accommodation Portal. I've been trying to get in touch with you regarding the interest you showed in one of the properties, Walmsley Studios, London. üè°

Could you please let me know a good time for us to connect? Looking forward to hearing from you! ‚ú®

Thanks a lot! üòä

Best regards,
Ashutush

timeline.content:
Dear Ashutush

Thank you very much for your kind support and for taking the time to assist me with the accommodation booking.

I truly appreciate your efforts, but unfortunately, my situation has changed. Since I will be using a scholarship, I am required to stay in the official university accommodation. Because of this restriction, I will no longer be able to proceed with the booking through your service.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and sincerely thank you again for your kind assistance and understanding.

Wishing you all the best.

Warm regards,
Kufu
